card module

class Card.Card(suit, value)¶

card class

Deck.py¶

Deck module

class Deck.Deck(mode='full')¶

Deck class

build_deck(suits, values)¶

Method which adds Card objects to deck, to create a complete deck of our Deck object.

set_mode(mode)¶

Sets the mode of the deck.

Parameters

mode (str) – ‘full’ or ‘small’. Corresponds to playing with 52 cards or cards above 5 in value (of every suit).
